article_title: Mourners gather at Al Jazeera cameraman's funeral.
sentence: Dozens  of  mourners  have  gathered  in  southern  Gaza  for  the  funeral  of  Al  Jazeera  journalist  and  cameraman,  Samer  Abudaqa,  who  was  killed  on  Friday  in  an  Israeli  strike.

article_title: Mourners gather at Al Jazeera cameraman's funeral.
sentence: Samer  Abudaqa  was  killed  whilst  reporting  at  a  school  in  Khan  Younis.
